replies.bodyText: When I first took over this change, the test failed with NPE without any details. It is because the exception thrown returns null from getMessage(). joiner.join(name, null) causes the NPE, so I changed it to print stack trace once getMessage() returns null. It's better for debugging.
replies.author: viirya

replies.bodyText:
NPE is why toString() is what new code should do.
Why don't we just throw new AssertionError(name +ex, ex). That way, the stack trace doesn't get lost, which is something we never want to have happen,
